mainValueHTML: Conveniently, try to raise your tier by checking the exact spell cooltime.

error.riotError: Currently, there is a problem with summoner search due to a failure in the official API server of League of Legends.
error.matchcodeErr: We can't check whether you're playing the game.

search.checkNickname: Please check your Summoner Name is correct.

speech.infoHTML:
* Currently, only Korean is supported for voice recognition.
Voice recognition has begun.
You can check by referring to [리 신 노궁] / [레오나 노플] etc.
Please note that voice recognition cannot be recognized as an error when using two or more tabs at the same time.
